parameters.name: State
parameters.description: Visibility state as defined in swComponentVisibilityState_e

parameters.name: Config_opt
parameters.description: Configuration option as defined in swInConfigurationOpts_e

parameters.name: Config_names
parameters.description: Array of configuration names; valid only if Config_opt is set to swInConfigurationOpts_e.swSpecifyConfiguration

title: IComponent2.SetVisibility
description: Sets the visibility state for this component.
signature:
void SetVisibility( 
   System.Int32
State
,
   System.Int32
Config_opt
,
   System.Object
Config_names
)

parameters.name: State
parameters.description: Visibility state as defined in swComponentVisibilityState_e

parameters.name: Config_opt
parameters.description: Configuration option as defined in swInConfigurationOpts_e

parameters.name: Config_names
parameters.description: Array of configuration names; valid only if Config_opt is set to swInConfigurationOpts_e.swSpecifyConfiguration
